All Classes

Class
Description
Assets
Crops each sprite from the spritesheet to use
Board
Generates the game's board using a .txt file
BonusReward
This class represents bonus rewards (golden souls), which are not required be collected in order to win the game
Cell
Parent class for Cells
Character
Parent class for all moving objects
Command
Enum for keyboard moves
Controller
Represents a game controller.
Display
Creates the canvas and window for graphics to be displayed on
Enemy
This class represents the Enemy
Entity
Abstract class for entities in the game Position represents position of the entity.
Game
Represents a game
GameState
Represents a GameState of a Grim game.
GrimState
Represents a state of a Grim game
GroundCell
Class to use ground Cells
ImageLoader
Takes image from textures path in resources and turns it into a BufferedImage
InstructionsState
State that shows the user how to play the game
Item
This class represent static entities (souls) in the game
LoseEndState
Represents a losing end state of a Grim game
Main
 
MainCharacter
This class represents the main character(grim reaper) controlled by the user
MenuState
Represents a menu state of a Grim game
Path
Supports Entity's (in this version: Enemy's) navigation by storing Points and cost to travel path in one class enabling access via Point
PathHeap
Enables faster paths' costs storage and accessing
PathNode
Allows proper implementation of PathNode
Punishment
This class represents punishments (red souls) that if collided with, will decrease the player's score
RegularReward
This class represents regular rewards (blue souls) that have to be collected in order to win the game
SoundAssets
Plays sound effects
SoundLoader
Loads sound files from given path
SpriteSheet
Takes a BufferedImage and returns a 32x32 pixel cropped BufferedImage part of the image
UserInput
This Class uses the KeyListener to listen to keyboard inputs and return the key pressed
Utils
Utilities to use in the project
WallCell
Class to use wall Cells
WinEndState
Represents a winning end state of a Grim game
